title: We're Vayam
text: Vayam is a voluntary movement aimed at strengthening the roots of democracy. We work with people who are deprived of their democratic rights and train them to fight for and achieve their rights in a democratic way. Vayam does this by empowering the people, especially tribal youth and women, with legal know how. Vayam regards people as participants not beneficiaries. It endeavours to develop community institutions for self-rule and governance of land, water, and forest. Village assembly (Gram Sabha), women’s SHG (self-help-groups) and of course youth leaders are some of the channels through which Vayam hopes to usher in change. At Vayam, people decide the priorities . Team Vayam evolves tools and techniques to bring the agenda to fruition. Work together: We believe that democracy is not only about electing representatives but by being actively involved in governance. We train our people to work with the government officials to bring about all benefitting changes. Vayam’s tools and techniques of building democratic strength is a freeware. It is freely shared with other organisations and active citizens. Many organisations have used Vayam’s methods to ensure a benefit far beyond Vayam’s reach. This ripple effect is our pride.

meta.vision: Empowering Indian citizens – beginning with the most backward – to govern their natural resources and prosper through decentralized democratic systems
meta.mission: Making leaders at roots – for democracy and environment – through activities of capacity building and institution building at village level raising a community system of conservation and management of common natural resources; viz. water and forest.

text: Believe in something larger than yourself... get involved in the big ideas of your time.

meta.note: Vayam is registered as a public charitable trust under BPT Act: E/5221/Pune. Donations to Vayam are eligible for tax exemption under section 80G of IT Act. Once you transfer funds, kindly write to vayamindia@gmail.com with donor’s name, PAN, and details of transfer( Cheque/NEFT). Your receipt will be sent on your email.

title: Success is a journey, not a destination
text: A journey of a thousand miles must begin with a single step. It is is never ending. There's always gonna be growth, improvement, adversity; you just gotta take it all in and do what's right, continue to grow, continue to live in the moment.
